All Classes

Class Summary 
Class Description
Basketball
This class is used to implement a game of Basketball.
Football
This class is used to implement a game of Football.
Game
This abstract class is the super-class for Basketball, Soccer, Hockey, and Football.
Hockey
This class is used to implement a game of Hockey.
Scoreboard
This class acts as the driver class for the Scoreboard program.
ScoringMethod
This class is used to implement a new ScoringMethod type, which can represent a game-specific scoring method, including the name of the scoring method (for example: "touchdown") as well as the value of the scoring method (for example, a touchdown is worth 6 points).
Soccer
This class is used to implement a game of Soccer.
Team
This class is used to represent a team in a certain game.
